text: Brickellia adenolepis is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to west-central Mexico in the States of Zacatecas, Jalisco, and Aguascalientes.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272 ==References== adenolepis Category:Flora of Mexico Category:Plants described in 1913
title: Brickellia adenolepis
